Text.Text: Who are you?  Legion mercenaries?  If so, I'd flee now if I were you - I've got a wizard's arsenal at my disposal, enough to level this tower!
Forgive me - it's just that, well, a dark elf was the last friendly face I expected to see in Kuldahar.  I'm Sheemish - I'm the blacksmith in Kuldahar.  Or was, until the yuan-ti attacked.

Forgive me - it's just that, well, a dark elf was the last friendly face I expected to see in Kuldahar... and especially a dark elf of such beauty... by the Gods, I see the tales of your race's features are not exaggerated.
Tymora's eyes, where did I leave my head?  Many apologies, my lady, I'm Sheemish - I'm the blacksmith here in Kuldahar.  Or I mean, I was, until the yuan-ti attacked.

Forgive me - it's just that, well, I wasn't expecting to see any friendly faces in Kuldahar come through that door.  I'm Sheemish - I'm the blacksmith in Kuldahar.  Or was, until the yuan-ti attacked.

Almost was!  I got into the tower here all right without them spotting me, but it was a close thing.  I was hoping Orrick may have left some of his wizard's arsenal lying around here - with the yuan-ti attack, we need anything we can get our hands on if we even hope to drive them out of Kuldahar.

I'm hunting for weapons... I managed to sneak up to the tower here without the yuan-ti spotting me, but it was a close thing.  I was hoping Orrick left some of his wizard's arsenal lying around here - with the yuan-ti attack, we need anything we can get our hands on if we even hope to drive them out of Kuldahar.

Aye, Orrick - he was a wizard who lived here many years ago, but he left a long time ago, and no one's heard from him since.  It took us months to realize he was gone - and we figured it was best not to disturb his tower in case he came back.  So we've watched it fall apart for years.

Normally, I wouldn't have braved this place, but I thought there might be some magic items here we could use to defend Kuldahar - and I was right.  I found a whole mess of scrolls, under the *bed,* no less - they were all in this old scroll case.  But the inside of the case is enough to fill a library.

Once I stumbled across that, I've been searching the rest of the place in case there's anything else - but Tymora hasn't blessed me yet.  If you happen to cross paths with my father again, just let him know I'm all right - I've just got my hands full here, and I want to see what else I can find before I make the run back.

Once I stumbled across that, I've been searching the rest of the place in case there's anything else - but Tymora hasn't blessed me yet.  I've been meaning to make a quick run back to my father and tell him what I've found, but I may not get another chance to search this place.

Conlan's in the dockhouse, by the stream to the south - we've got a pile of boxes and weapons piled out front of the house.  He doesn't see too good, but he should be all right as long as he keeps a weapon close by.  If you're in need any weapons or armor, he should be able to help you - we've got plenty.

Iselore?  Sure, he's in the southern part of town, near the circle of stones - the stones that surround the Heartstone Gem.  Be careful if you approach him, though.  With the yuan-ti attacks, he's... changed.

Most of the time, he's normal, but when he's attacked - it's like he and the Heartstone Gem become *one.*  His eyes pulse with the same light as the gem, and he won't even hear you if you're right next to him.  It's like he shuts off the outside world when the Gem is threatened, so be careful.
Gerbash?  Wasn't he at the watchtower with Jermsy and Nathaniel?
No, haven't seen him - but my father and I heard a battle on the eastern side of town a day or two ago.  Perhaps the battle involved Gerbash - if so, I hope he's all right.
What are you talking about?
No... are you sure?  Sometimes the light can play tricks on the eye...
What do you mean?  All I have is... hey, where did all this junk come from?
Welcome back - still hunting, not much luck, though.  Still, there's a chance I'll find something else.  Do you need some scrolls?
Welcome back - still hunting, not much luck, though.  Still, there's a chance I'll find something else.  Do you need some scrolls?
Uh... "Yemnit Progales K'apahcs?"  No, is that some sort of spell?

Welcome back!  I think I searched everywhere I could in Orrick's tower, and I didn't find anything else, so when I heard you were coming back to Kuldahar, I thought I would wait out here for you.  Do you need some scrolls?  I have them all here, if you wanted to see them.
I'm <CHARNAME> - we come in peace.  Oswald brought us here to help you stop the Legion of the Chimera.
We are not your enemy - we're from the Ten-Towns, and we've come to help.
We're here to help Kuldahar, not destroy it, so don't give us cause to do so.
I'm <CHARNAME> - we come in peace.  Oswald brought us here to help you stop the Legion of the Chimera.
We are not your enemy - we're from the Ten-Towns, and we've come to help.
We're here to help Kuldahar, not destroy it, so don't give us cause to do so.
I'm <CHARNAME> - we come in peace.  Oswald brought us here to help you stop the Legion of the Chimera.
We are not your enemy - we're from the Ten-Towns, and we've come to help.
We're here to help Kuldahar, not destroy it, so don't give us cause to do so.
I'm <CHARNAME> - we come in peace.  Oswald brought us here to help you stop the Legion of the Chimera.
We are not your enemy - we're from the Ten-Towns, and we've come to help.
We're here to help Kuldahar, not destroy it, so don't give us cause to do so.
We encountered your father - he was worried you had been captured by the yuan-ti.
What are you doing here?
Your kind words are appreciated.  Who are you?
I... see.  Perhaps you'd best tell me who you are.
If I could interrupt your staring for a moment, perhaps you could introduce yourself.
Watch your tongue and your eyes, male - I have no time for your pathetic human flattery.  Identify yourself.
We encountered your father, Sheemish - he was worried you had been captured by the yuan-ti.
What are you doing here?
We encountered your father - he was worried you had been captured by the yuan-ti.
What are you doing here?
Orrick?
Orrick?  This is his tower, then - Conlan mentioned him.
Orrick?
If we see him, we'll tell him.  Say, could we see what scrolls you've found?
All right... uh, do you know what in the hells that apparition in the corner is?
Can you tell me where I might find Iselore?
We're looking for someone named Gerbash.  Have you seen him?
We'll leave you to your search, then.  Farewell, Sheemish.
Where's your father?  I could tell him you're all right - he may be worried about you.
All right... uh, do you know what in the hells that apparition in the corner is?
Could we see what scrolls you've found?
Can you tell me where I might find Iselore?
Maybe you can help me with something else - we're looking for someone named Gerbash.  Have you seen him?
We'll leave you to your search, then.  Farewell, Sheemish.
All right... uh, do you know what in the hells that apparition in the corner is?
Very well.  Could I see what scrolls you've found?
Can you tell me where I might find Iselore?
Maybe you can help me with something else - we're looking for someone named Gerbash.  Have you seen him?
We'll see if we can find Conlan, then.  Farewell, Sheemish.
What do you mean?
Do you know what in the hells that apparition in the corner is?
We will.  Could I see what scrolls you've found?
Maybe you can help me with something else - we're looking for someone named Gerbash.  Have you seen him?
Very well.  Farewell, Sheemish.
He left the watchtower and was headed for Kuldahar - but we don't know if he arrived or not.
We already *came* from the watchtower, "blacksmith" - last word of him was that he had come here.  Have you seen him or not?
I guess we'll find out.  In the meantime, do you know what in the hells that apparition in the corner is?
We'll check it out, then.  In the meantime, could I see what scrolls you've found?
Can you tell me where I might find Iselore?
We'll see if we can find Gerbash there, then.  Farewell, Sheemish.
That ghostly apparition there - can't you see it?
Odd.  Never mind, then... could I see what scrolls you've found?
Say, do you have any other items that may have suddenly appeared on your person?
Can I see those special items that you suddenly found on you?
Can you tell me where I might find Iselore?
Maybe you can help me with something else - we're looking for someone named Gerbash.  Have you seen him?
Hmm.  Perhaps.  Never mind, then.
I don't know, but I'd like to see those items.
Who knows... let me see what scrolls you've found.
The planes work in mysterious ways.  Can you tell me where I might find Iselore?
No matter, maybe you can help me with something else - we're looking for someone named Gerbash.  Have you seen him?
It's a long story... perhaps I'll tell you later.  Farewell, Sheemish.
Do you know what in the hells that apparition in the corner is?
Say, do the words "Yemnit Progales K'apahcs," mean anything to you?
Say, just one last time - do the words "Yemnit Progales K'apahcs," mean anything to you?
Could I see what scrolls you've found?
Say, do you have any other items that may have suddenly appeared on your person?
Can I see those special items that you suddenly found on you?
Can you tell me where I might find Iselore?
We're looking for someone named Gerbash.  Have you seen him?
Not at the moment.  Farewell.
Do you know what in the hells that apparition in the corner is?

Can you tell me where I might find Iselore?
We're looking for someone named Gerbash.  Have you seen him?
Not at the moment.  Farewell.
It sounds like a spell when you say it - are you sure it doesn't mean anything to you?
Whoa - *that* did something - I have this feeling something is about to appear on the west side of the room.
Whoa - *that* did something - I have this feeling something is about to appear on the west side of the room.
Never mind.  Could I see what scrolls you've found?
Forget it - do you have any other items that may have suddenly appeared on your person?
Can I see those special items that you suddenly found on you?
No matter.  Can you tell me where I might find Iselore?
Maybe you can help me with something else.  We're looking for someone named Gerbash.  Have you seen him?
Maybe I was wrong.  Farewell.
Say, do the words "Yemnit Progales K'apahcs," mean anything to you?
Say, just one last time - do the words "Yemnit Progales K'apahcs," mean anything to you?
Could I see what scrolls you've found?
Say, do you have any other items that may have suddenly appeared on your person?
Can I see those special items that you suddenly found on you?
Can you tell me where I might find Iselore?
We're looking for someone named Gerbash.  Have you seen him?
Not at the moment.  Farewell.
